messages.subject: International kitchen trivia
messages.msgSnippet: Here in Hawaii rice cookers are common (I guess because of all the Asian influence) - but I have, as yet, never been able to find one with an inside that was
messages.messageBody:
Here in Hawaii rice cookers are common (I guess because of all the Asian
influence) - but I have, as yet, never been able to find one with an inside
that was not aluminum, which I'd rather not use. Anyone know of one with a
stainless inner pot?
Thanks and aloha, Lee

NORTH COUNTRY FARMS
